verses.text: \w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w those|strong="H1992"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w became|strong="H2470"\w* \w mortally|strong="H4191"\w* \w ill|strong="H2470"\w*. \w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Amoz \w came|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w him|strong="H6680"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* said, “\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w Put|strong="H4191"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w order|strong="H6680"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w about|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*; \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w recover|strong="H2421"\w*.’”

\w Then|strong="H3068"\w* Hezekiah \w turned|strong="H5437"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w wall|strong="H7023"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w prayed|strong="H6419"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, saying,

“\w Please|strong="H4994"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w how|strong="H4994"\w* \w I|strong="H1980"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w You|strong="H6440"\w* faithfully \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w wholehearted|strong="H8003"\w* devotion; \w I|strong="H1980"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H2896"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*.” \w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w wept|strong="H1058"\w* \w bitterly|strong="H1419"\w*.

\w Before|strong="H3808"\w* \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w left|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w middle|strong="H8484"\w* \w courtyard|strong="H5892"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w him|strong="H3318"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*,

“\w Go|strong="H5927"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w tell|strong="H8085"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w leader|strong="H5057"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w My|strong="H8085"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* father \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w*; \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w tears|strong="H1832"\w*. \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w surely|strong="H7725"\w* \w heal|strong="H7495"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w*. \w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w now|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w add|strong="H3254"\w* \w fifteen|strong="H2568"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w life|strong="H3117"\w*. \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Assyria. \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w defend|strong="H1598"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w My|strong="H1732"\w* \w sake|strong="H4616"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sake|strong="H4616"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w My|strong="H1732"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.’”

\w Then|strong="H3947"\w* \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w* said, “\w Prepare|strong="H7760"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* poultice \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w figs|strong="H8384"\w*.” \w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w brought|strong="H3947"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w and|strong="H3947"\w* applied \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w boil|strong="H7822"\w*, \w and|strong="H3947"\w* Hezekiah \w recovered|strong="H2421"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3117"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w* \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w*, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* sign \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w heal|strong="H7495"\w* \w me|strong="H5927"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*?”

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w replied|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sign \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w promised|strong="H1696"\w*: \w Would|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w like|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w forward|strong="H1980"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w steps|strong="H4609"\w*, \w or|strong="H3068"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w steps|strong="H4609"\w*?”

“\w It|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H6738"\w* \w easy|strong="H7043"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w lengthen|strong="H5186"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w steps|strong="H4609"\w*,” \w answered|strong="H7725"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*, “\w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w go|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w steps|strong="H4609"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H7121"\w* \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w out|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w steps|strong="H4609"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w descended|strong="H3381"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w stairway|strong="H4609"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Ahaz.

\w At|strong="H4428"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w Merodach-baladan|strong="H1255"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Baladan|strong="H1081"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Babylon \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w letters|strong="H5612"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w gift|strong="H4503"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w about|strong="H8085"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*’s illness.

\w And|strong="H3701"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w received|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* envoys \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w showed|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w treasure|strong="H5238"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*—\w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w spices|strong="H1314"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w precious|strong="H2896"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w well|strong="H2896"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w armory|strong="H1004"\w*—\w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* storehouses. \w There|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w dominion|strong="H4474"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w show|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3470"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w* \w went|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*, “\w Where|strong="H4100"\w* \w did|strong="H4100"\w* those men \w come|strong="H7350"\w* \w from|strong="H7350"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w did|strong="H4100"\w* \w they|strong="H4100"\w* say \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w*?” “\w They|strong="H4100"\w* \w came|strong="H4428"\w* \w from|strong="H7350"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w distant|strong="H7350"\w* land,” \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* replied, “\w from|strong="H7350"\w* Babylon.”

“\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w*?” Isaiah \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*. “\w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w*,” \w answered|strong="H1697"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*. “\w There|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w among|strong="H7200"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* treasures \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w did|strong="H4100"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w show|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H8085"\w* \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*, “\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*:

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w surely|strong="H2009"\w* come \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* fathers \w have|strong="H3068"\w* stored \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w carried|strong="H5375"\w* \w off|strong="H5375"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* Babylon. \w Nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w left|strong="H3498"\w*, \w says|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w some|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w*, \w your|strong="H3947"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w* flesh \w and|strong="H1121"\w* blood, \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w palace|strong="H1964"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Babylon.”

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w*, “\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*.” \w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w thought|strong="H1697"\w*, “\w Will|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* least \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w security|strong="H7965"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w lifetime|strong="H3117"\w*?”

\w As|strong="H1697"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*, \w along|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w might|strong="H1369"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w how|strong="H6213"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w constructed|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w pool|strong="H1295"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* tunnel \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w bring|strong="H6213"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Book|strong="H5612"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Chronicles|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*?

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w rested|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w his|strong="H8478"\w* fathers, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H8478"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w in|strong="H4427"\w* \w his|strong="H8478"\w* \w place|strong="H8478"\w*.
